TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Publish extends System.Object implements class System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher

summary.span: 为启用 SOAP 的 COM+ 应用程序发布 COM 接口。

span.span: Publishes COM interfaces for SOAP-enabled COM+ applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由.NET Framework 内部使用。 is used internally by the .NET Framework. 不需要在代码中直接使用它。You do not need to use it directly in your code.

summary.span: 返回 SoapCache 目录中生成的强名称签名程序集的完整路径。

span.span: Returns the full path for a strong-named signed generated assembly in the SoapCache directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于非托管 COM + 组件以通过 SOAP 终结点的.NET 远程处理发布，代理需要生成可向.NET Framework 提供的非托管的组件。For an unmanaged COM+ component to be published through .NET remoting as a SOAP endpoint, a proxy needs to be generated to make the unmanaged components available to the .NET Framework. 这可通过以编程方式执行与类型库导入程序 (Tlbimp.exe) 相同的步骤[!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/includes/winsdklong-md.md)]工具，用于将非托管的 COM + 类型库转换为代理元数据程序集。This is done by programmatically performing the same steps as Type Library Importer (Tlbimp.exe), the [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/includes/winsdklong-md.md)] tool that is used to convert unmanaged COM+ type libraries to proxy metadata assemblies. 但是，对于通过 SOAP 成功的客户端激活，客户端和服务器计算机必须共享相同的强名称签名的元数据代理服务器。For client activation over SOAP to succeed, however, client and server machines must share the same strong-named signed metadata proxies. 因此，托管的代理程序集生成的非托管的 COM + 组件时强名称密钥还生成和用于对代理程序集进行签名。For this reason, when a managed proxy assembly is generated for an unmanaged COM+ component, a strong name key is also generated and used to sign the proxy assembly.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径必须少于 248 个字符，且文件名必须少于 260 个字符。

span.span: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.

exception.span: 在字符串中间包含一个冒号 (:)。

span.span: contains a colon (:) in the middle of the string.
for reading files.

summary.span: 处理客户端类型库，在客户端上创建配置文件。

span.span: Processes a client type library, creating a configuration file on the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在客户端代理导入用于生成远程处理配置文件。This method is used on a client proxy import to generate a remoting configuration file. 如果`Mode`参数为"wellknownobject"或空字符串 ("")，则假定的已知对象;否则，将假定客户端激活。If the `Mode` parameter is either "wellknownobject" or an empty string (""), a well-known object is assumed; otherwise, client activation is assumed. 建议而不是使用。It is recommended that be used instead of .

summary.span: 处理服务器类型库，从而向 Web.config 和 Default.disco 文件中添加或删除组件项。

span.span: Processes a server type library, either adding or deleting component entries to the Web.config and Default.disco files.

summary.span: 必要时生成代理。

span.span: Generates a proxy if necessary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将条目添加到发现文件和 web.config 文件中的组件类型库，并生成或将代理复制到非托管组件的 bin 目录。 adds an entry to the discovery file and the web.config file for the components in the typelib, and either generates or copies a proxy to the bin directory for unmanaged components. 如果`Operation`等于"删除"，然后从 Web.config 和 Default.disco 文件中删除组件条目。If `Operation` equals "delete," then the component entries are removed from the Web.config and Default.disco files. 建议和而不是使用。It is recommended that and be used instead of .

span.span: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.

exception.span: 参数引用了 scrobj.dll；因此，不支持通过 SOAP 发布脚本组件。

span.span: The parameter referenced scrobj.dll; therefore, SOAP publication of script components is not supported.

permission.span: 若要访问非托管的代码的功能。

span.span: for the ability to access unmanaged code.

MemberSignature.Value: public void RegisterAssembly (string AssemblyPath);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RegisterAssembly(string AssemblyPath) cil managed
Public Sub RegisterAssembly (AssemblyPath As String)
public: virtual void RegisterAssembly(System::String ^ AssemblyPath);

param.name: AssemblyPath
param.span: 程序集的文件系统路径。

span.span: The file system path for the assembly.

summary.span: 为 COM 互操作注册程序集。

span.span: Registers an assembly for COM interop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用程序集注册工具 (Regasm.exe) 来注册程序集中的可创建类。 uses the Assembly Registration tool (Regasm.exe) to register the creatable classes in the assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Regasm.exe （程序集注册工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)。For more information, see [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md).

exception.span: 输入程序集没有强名称。

span.span: The input assembly does not have a strong name.

is not a valid assembly.

exception.span: 两次用两个不同的证据加载了程序集或模块，或程序集名称的长度超过 MAX_PATH 个字符。

span.span: An assembly or module was loaded twice with two different evidences, or the assembly name is longer than MAX_PATH characters.

exception.span: 使用 标记的方法不是 方法。

span.span: The signature of the method marked with is not valid.
